card_pen_effect: If you have no card in your other Pendulum Zone: You can place 1 face-up Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use this effect of "Patissciel Couverture" once per turn.
card_text: 2 Pendulum Monsters$NIf this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed: You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone.
